item.description:
The exciting equestrian sport of Grand Prix show jumping comes to Hampton Falls, NH on the first Sunday in September with a full day of entertainment at the Fidelity Investments Jumper Classic. The nation’s top riders and horses will vie for the largest prize in show jumping in New England on Sunday, September 7th, during the $75,000 Fidelity Investments Grand Prix.

Gates open at 10:00am when spectators who come to watch the Olympic caliber competition can enjoy a unique outing on the scenic show grounds nestled among apple orchards and horse farms. The Boutique Village will feature a variety of shopping opportunities, including unique gifts, custom riding apparel, antiques, jewelry and products for the home.

VIP guests will enjoy ringside seating under the tents and a four-course Korbel California Champagne Luncheon, catered by Tavern on the Green of New York City’s Central Park. General admission ticket holders will have a ringside view of the competition and can bring seating or picnics, or purchase food on the grounds.

Schedule of Events
10:00am Boutique Village Opens
11:00am Korbel California Champagne Luncheon catered by Tavern on the Green
11:30am Bombardier Skyjet Opening Ceremonies
Hosted by Randy Price and Frances Rivera, Co-Anchors 7NEWS Boston
The Boston Park Rangers Mounted Troops
The famous Skydive New England Air Exhibition
12:00pm $15,000 Equine Insurance Services Speed Stake Presented by Greatamerican
2:00pm The Clarendon Intermission
Musical Freestyle by Susan Jaccoma
Live Performance by Ki-Juan Minors - a rendition of “Killing Me Softly”
Winners of the Ladies Best Hat Contest will be announced by Glen Kelley,
Publisher of Boston Common Magazine
2:30pm $75,000 Fidelity Investments AGA Grand Prix
5:00pm Award Ceremony in the Adequan Winner’s Circle

Location
Silver Oaks Equestrian Center, 340 Exeter Rd, Hampton Falls, NH

General Admission
Adults $25
Child $20
Children under 6 free.

For more details:
www.jumperclassic.com
item.how_to_find_us: Meetup location is the food court at 10:30am. Cell phone # sent to attendees.
item.name: Special Event: Fidelity Jumper Classic, Hampton Falls, NH
